commenter_a: I have been noticing that on comments sections of news articles on Facebook regarding the death of Supreme Court Justice Antonin Scalia, it is the Bernie Sanders supporters/Bernie Bros who are celebrating the death of the late Supreme Court justice. I may have disagreed with his ideology and beliefs, but that is not a reason to celebrate and be happy of someone's death. Says a lot about the mentality of many Berniebots... especially the younger generations.
